summary: An email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York requesting forms or records filled out by six individuals (names redacted) from the recipient, referencing prior emails where a victim appeared to have sent forms. The email is part of the Epstein case document collection.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: Author of the email requesting forms or records filled out by six individuals from the recipient, working for the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.

keyFacts: The email is from an Assistant U.S. Attorney in the Southern District of New York requesting forms or records from six individuals (names redacted).
The email references prior emails where a victim appeared to have sent forms to the recipient, but those forms are not in possession.
The request is urgent, asking for the forms to be sent by the next day (October 6, 2021).
The document is part of the Epstein case files, indicating ongoing investigation or legal proceedings related to victims.
The email is marked as external, suggesting communication between different organizations or parties.
